features.additionalValue: Access money at a time that suits you
features.additionalInfo: Get access to money before your next pay day when you need it, between $300 and $5,000. There’s no need to contact or involve your employer.

If eligible, you can apply through NetBank or the CommBank app in just a few minutes. If your application is approved, your limit should be available instantly (usually within seconds but may take up to 1 business day).
You’ll be charged a fee depending on the amount you ask for. There are no extra charges if you pay back on time.

eligibility.additionalInfo: You must have your income paid into a CommBank Smart Access or Complete Access account and be registered for NetBank.

fees.name: Upfront fee
fees.additionalInfo: There is a single, upfront fee of $5 for every $500 (or part of) you ask for. This fee is charged when your CommBank AdvancePay limit is applied to your account, regardless of whether the temporary limit is accessed or not. Your final limit will be made up of the amount approved and the fee.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: If your CommBank AdvancePay limit is not fully repaid once your chosen pay date arrives, your account will be considered overdrawn and you’ll be charged the debit excess interest rate.

data.name: CommBank AdvancePay
data.description: CommBank AdvancePay gives you access to money you expect to be paid, before your next pay day. It is a short term facility applied to your everyday account as a temporary limit.
